item.title: Tory MP claims Brexit voters didnâ€™t want to leave the EU to get â€˜immigration from the rest of the worldâ€™
item.description:
A Tory MP accused the government of losing â€œcontrol of the Channelâ€ and said working-class Brexit voters â€œdid not vote to replace immigration from Europe with more immigration from the rest of the world.â€

During yesterdayâ€™s PMQs Conservative MP for Gainsborough Sir Edward Leigh also said the government should not be â€œheld to ransomâ€ over loosened immigration rules in a trade deal with India.

But speaking in the House of Commons, Boris Johnson ruled out relaxing immigration rules in a bid to tempt India to sign a free trade agreement.

That magical moment when the penny drops for Brexiter MP Edward Leigh, that stopping freedom of movement from Europe may mean more immigrants from India. \n\nAnother for the ever expanding That's-Not-The-Brexit-I-Ordered collection. #PMQs ~AApic.twitter.com/k7dT6NHsCU
— Best for Britain (@Best for Britain) 1641398103

Leigh said: â€œApparently the Government is thinking of relaxing visa controls from India in order to get a free trade deal.

â€œWhilst a free trade deal is valuable in itself we should not be held to ransom.

â€œWould he agree with me that our new working-class voters who voted Brexit did not vote to replace immigration from Europe with more immigration from the rest of the world, anymore than when they were told that they would take back control, we would lose control of the Channel?â€

Sign up to our free Indy100 weekly newsletter

Sir Edwardâ€™s remarks on the Channel follow the publication of numbers from the BBC which estimate that at least 28,431 people made the dangerous journey last year - treble the number for 2020.

Sir Edward went on to ask Johnson if heâ€™s â€œwilling to connect to our supportersâ€ and control immigration.

Answering, Johnson said â€œyesâ€, before adding: â€œI donâ€™t recognise the account he has given at all.â€

The prime minister said â€œwe donâ€™t do free trade deals on that basisâ€ and insisted that net immigration has reduced since his party took control.

He added that the Borders Bill, currently in the House of Lords, would allow the UK to â€œtake back control of our bordersâ€ and tackle illegal immigration.

The controversial bill could mean that British people could be stripped of their citizenship without notice. A petition calling for this clause to be removed from the bill has garnered over 310,000 signatures, and protesters yesterday gathered outside the Houses of Parliament yesterday to call for the â€œracistâ€ legislation to be binned.

Talks with India over a trade agreement are due to begin within the next few weeks as international trade secretary Anne-Marie Trevelyan is expected to travel to Delhi.

The Times reports that one option being considered to tempt India into signing a free trade agreement is similar to a scheme with Australia, where young people can work in the UK for up to three years. Itâ€™s been reported that another option on the table could see reduced fees for Indian students and permission to stay in Britain for a longer period after they graduate.

The newspaper also said that although Trevelyan has the backing of foreign secretary Liz Truss, while home secretary Priti Patel is said to oppose the offer.
item.dc:creator: Greg Evans
item.author: Greg Evans

item.title: Testing tester images
item.description:
Remind me to thank John for a lovely weekend. We gotta burn the rain forest, dump toxic waste, pollute the air, and rip up the OZONE! 'Cause maybe if we screw up this planet enough, they won't want it anymore! Did he just throw my cat out of the window?

They're using our own satellites against us. And the clock is ticking. You're a very talented young man, with your own clever thoughts and ideas. Do you need a manager? You're a very talented young man, with your own clever thoughts and ideas. Do you need a manager?

My dad once told me, laugh and the world laughs with you, Cry, and I'll give you something to cry about you little bastard! Life finds a way. Jaguar shark! So tell me - does it really exist? Hey, you know how I'm, like, always trying to save the planet? Here's my chance.

Do you have any idea how long it takes those cups to decompose. You're a very talented young man, with your own clever thoughts and ideas. Do you need a manager? Jaguar shark! So tell me - does it really exist? God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs.

Did he just throw my cat out of the window? Jaguar shark! So tell me - does it really exist? My dad once told me, laugh and the world laughs with you, Cry, and I'll give you something to cry about you little bastard! Must go faster. Must go faster. Yeah, but your scientists were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn't stop to think if they should.

item.title: Trump pushes push Jan 6 conspiracies and claims that â€œstates from 2020 election are going to be turnedâ€
item.description:
Donald Trump may have cancelled his January 6 press event, but that hasnâ€™t stopped him from running his mouth on TV about election conspiracies and claimed that â€œnumerous states from 2020 election are going to be turned.â€

The former president sat down with Christina Bobb from the conservative One America News Network (OAN) in a one-on-one interview on January 4,th and like a broken record said he believes â€œthe elections are rigged and the borders are broken,â€ as reported by Media Matters.

â€œI used to talk about the broken borders, but I never talked about the elections because I never thought the elections could be rigged,â€ he said.

So, Trump never talked the elections were rigged until right around the time he lost - what a coincidence...

Later on, the 75-year-old went into full-on conspiracy mode and claimed: â€œThings are coming out in the next couple of days.â€

â€œI hear a very big story is coming out today on the cheating and numerous states are going to be turned - I donâ€™t know what theyâ€™re going to do but itâ€™s gonna show that they were won by me. Itâ€™s already shown.â€

Sign up to our free Indy100 weekly newsletter

â€œIf you look at Arizona, the finding in Arizona thatâ€™s over - we won it and Iâ€™m going out there next week, Iâ€™m making a speech but if you look at those findings we won the state. Now itâ€™s up to the Attorney General to see if he is going to do something.â€

This claim by Trump has been refuted by a 93-page report by the Maricopa County Elections Department which identified misleading or false claims in the partisan audit of Trumpâ€™s â€œlossâ€ Reuters reported.

It showed that 22 claims that were misleading, 41 that included flawed or misstated analysis and 13 that were demonstrably false and found no evidence of double voting.

â€œWe determined that nearly every finding included faulty analysis, inaccurate claims, misleading conclusions and a lack of understanding of federal and state election laws,â€ the report said.

Meanwhile, Trump also praised Bobb and OAN for their coverage of the â€œriggedâ€ election, and told the host: â€œYou cover this better than anybody, and you know what you do and what OAN does is so important.â€

It should be noted that Bobb assisted in the campaign to get the 2020 election result overturned and was one of six people present at Trumpâ€™s â€œwar roomâ€ at the Willard Hotel as they tried to prevent Bidenâ€™s win from being certified - the same day of the Capitol riots, The Washington Post reported.

Now that weâ€™ve mentioned the Capitol riots, which happened exactly a year ago today, Trump spoke about the attack and claimed his supporters were in Washington D.C. because â€œthe election got rigged and stolen from the American peopleâ€ and came to listen to his speech.

According to Trump â€œthere was love that day,â€ and just a â€œtiny percentageâ€ of those who attended his speech before things kicked off, were a part of the riots.

Well, looking at the footage from the fateful day along with some of the most infamous faces from the Capitol riots, it seems that many of them were Trump supporters.

Twitter

include parent tweet

On January 4th, Trump cancelled his press event scheduled on the first anniversary of the insurrection on January 6 and in a statement shared by his spokesperson Liz Harington, accused the select committee investigating the riots and the media of committing â€œthe Crime of the Centuryâ€

item.title: Health minister canâ€™t answer how many NHS staff have left because of Brexit in excruciating interview
item.description:
A minister was unable to answer how many NHS staff have left the country due to Brexit in an embarassing interview on Wednesday morning.

Care and mental health minister Gillian Keegan fumbled during an interview on Good Morning Britain after Susanna Reid pressed her on the figures amid rising staff absences in hospitals throughout the UK due to coronavirus.

'How many NHS staff left because of Brexit?'\n\n@susannareid100 questions @GillianKeegan over the exact number of NHS staff that left because of Brexit.\n\nThe Health & Social Care Minister admits she doesn't 'have that number'.pic.twitter.com/jzKbiyn5of
— Good Morning Britain (@Good Morning Britain) 1641373303

She said: â€œI donâ€™t have that numberâ€ before trying to change the subject by explaining the governmentâ€™s EU resettlement scheme.

Reid tried to ask again and Keegan said again â€œI donâ€™t have that numberâ€ to which Reid replied â€œIâ€™m asking you why not?â€

Sign up to our new free Indy100 weekly newsletter

â€œWe donâ€™t measure our NHS staff by where they come from,â€ Keegan said.

â€œWe have more NHS staff in general and theyâ€™ve come from all over... and thereâ€™s also lots more medical schools and nursing schools been set up here to help our own young people or people who want to retrain...â€

Reid said: â€œSo according to figures, and this is two years ago, more than 22,000 EU nationals have left the NHS since the Brexit referendum. That was two years ago so I have no idea what the figures are now but you are saying every single one of those posts has been filled by somebody else.â€

Keegan said we have 10,000 more nurses and 5,000 more doctors and so those posts have been filled.

But reacting to the clip, people thought Keegan had a bit of a shocker:

Over to the Fact Checkers ..... #BorisJohnson #NHS #GillianKeegan #Omicronhttps://twitter.com/Haggis_UK/status/1478652673884835843\u00a0\u2026
— Mark Vernon (@Mark Vernon) 1641373487
Health and social care Minister Gillian Keegan doing media round this morning and demonstrating brilliantly why she - like so many of her Tory colleagues- is not fit for office.https://twitter.com/gmb/status/1478652921394962432\u00a0\u2026
— Siobhan Benita (@Siobhan Benita) 1641373781

Elsewhere on her media round, Keegan revealed that around one million people are currently self-isolating with coronavirus.

She told Sky News: â€œWe donâ€™t collect that data on a daily basis but itâ€™s obvious if you look at the number of people who tested positive yesterday - about 215,000, theyâ€™ll all be self isolating...itâ€™s probably about a million people self isolating right now."

item.title: Daughter tells parents her boyfriend is trans â€“ and their reaction has sparked a social media storm
item.description:
A teenager has been hailed for her bravery across social media after she shared the moment she told her parents that sheâ€™d fallen in love with a transgender man.

The young TikTok user, called Elyse, uploaded recordings of the deeply personal interaction to the platform on Saturday.

The clips offer a painful insight into the challenges people face around transphobia and the acceptance of gender identities.

In the first recording, Elyse can be heard sobbing as her furious father yells that her boyfriend is â€œnot a boy.â€

â€œGive me a break,â€ he yells repeatedly, as she weeps: â€œHe is, he just hasnâ€™t started testosterone yet.â€

He then tells her: â€œYou have the choice, you have the choice, but this is not the right choice and you know that, down deep inside.â€

In a second recording, Elyse tells her parents that she and her boyfriend have been together for seven to eight months, at which point her dad accuses her of being â€œwilling to give up [her] familyâ€ for â€œsomeone who doesnâ€™t know their left from their rightâ€.

As the teenager protests that she loves her parents â€œso muchâ€ and she had never intended to upset them, he continues: â€œIâ€™m sorry but youâ€™ve put a major, major wall between us.â€

â€œThis is not the way we brought you up,â€ his rant continues. â€œAnd if this is what you choose, we canâ€™t change it, but these are the consequences.â€

As Elyse protests that her boyfriend is â€œamazingâ€ and she just wanted to be honest with her parents about their relationship, her mum chimes in: â€œDid you really think we were going to support it?â€

The mother continues: â€œYou made this choice knowingly, you knew what you were doing. Nobodyâ€™s holding a knife to you to go be his loverâ€¦â€ at which point the father interjects: â€œItâ€™s not a â€˜heâ€™, Mom. Itâ€™s a â€˜sheâ€™.â€

The clip ends with Elyseâ€™s dad telling her: â€œIf you choose this path then youâ€™re going to need to speed up being an adult really fast, OK?â€ before suggesting that he plans to cut her off financially.

He can then be heard storming off, as he tells her: â€œI would never have thought you would do this to me.â€

Elyseâ€™s recordings garnered more than 2.5 million views in just two days on TikTok alone, as users shared their admiration for her â€“ and sadness at her parentsâ€™ response.

â€œThe fact that [your father] is making it seem like you have to choose him or your family is horrible. Your dad chose that, not you,â€ one commented.

â€œBlood can be family, but family isnâ€™t always blood. It took me a long time to come to that realisation but I finally learned and Iâ€™ve never been happier,â€ said another.

Quoting Elyseâ€™s mum, a third wrote: â€œâ€˜Did you really think we would support it?â€™ YES! YES! Because when you have children you sign up for loving them unconditionally.â€

And a fourth added: â€œLeave that home. Find your family. [Your dad] has a lot of growing up, reflection and acceptance to go through.

â€œYou are so true to you and so loved.â€In a separate video, Elyse revealed that her parents had kicked her out of the house, with her mum giving her just five minutes to gather her belongings.

She added that her dad doesnâ€™t want to â€œsee me or talk to meâ€ and that, rather than speak to his daughter as she left their home, he got in his car and drove away.

Elyse said her mum then told her: â€œYou donâ€™t have to pack as though youâ€™re moving out,â€ to which she responded: â€œYouâ€™re not giving me a choice.â€

She stressed: â€œIf you think itâ€™s a choice for me to be who I am, youâ€™re not giving me a choice.â€In a happier clip, Elyse filmed herself with boyfriend Ash, as the pair looked loved-up and content.

Confirming that sheâ€™d been kicked out of home for â€œbeing with a trans man,â€ she smiled defiantly and said: â€œHappy Pride month, everybody!â€

item.title: Carole Baskin slams Netflix for â€˜made-up feudâ€™ with Joe Exotic: â€˜Never even spoken to himâ€™
item.description:
Tiger King star Carole Baskin made an appearance on This Morning today to discuss her upcoming show â€“ and was sidetracked in the process, making some brow-raising statements.

The big cat lover slammed Netflix, claiming that the streaming platform suggested that Tiger King would be similar to the likes of Blackfish, a 2013 documentary that unravelled the consequences of keeping orcas in captivity.

Baskin claimed that she worked with the Netflix producers for five years. Instead of making Tiger King â€œabout the animalsâ€, they allegedly turned it into a â€œmade-up feudâ€ between Baskin and the showâ€™s infamous protagonist, Joe Exotic.

When asked whether she had actually met Exotic, Baskin said she had been in the same room as him in court, but claims she has â€œnever even spoken to Joe Exotic.â€

She then made a shocking revelation that her missing husband, Don Lewis, could very well be alive.

Despite her legal battle with Tiger King 2, she said: â€œIâ€™ll tell what, one of the really exciting things that came out of Tiger King 2 is that they produced a letter from Homeland Security and it says that a special agent in charge with the FBI reached out to the Sheriffâ€™s Detective.

Sign up to our new free Indy100 weekly newsletter

â€œWhich means this had to have happened after 2002 because Homeland Security wasnâ€™t even around until 2002, and they said that my husband Don Lewis is alive and well in Costa Rica.

â€œAnd yet all of this hate has been made about me having something to do with his appearance when Homeland Security has known where he is since at least back then,â€ Baskin added.

The plot thickens in #TigerKing2 https://t.co/swevQC5yjo
— This Morning (@This Morning) 1637238447

Presenter Phillip Schofield candidly addressed rumours that his children from his previous marriage think Baskin â€œkilled him, minced him up and fed him to the tigers.â€

Baskin quickly responded: â€œI think maybe they should check with Homeland Security, who seems to know where he is.â€

When asked whether she believed him to be alive, she said: â€œI donâ€™t know how it is that Homeland Security says heâ€™s alive and well in Costa Rica, but Iâ€™m glad to hear it.â€

Carole Baskinâ€™s Cage Fight will offer a â€œtrue and authentic and rawâ€ series about bringing down animal exploiters â€“ â€œthatâ€™s why Joe Exotic is in jail,â€ she threw in. The show streams exclusively on Discovery+.

Indy100 has reached out to Netflix for comment.
item.dc:creator: Becca Monaghan
item.author: Becca Monaghan

media:content.media:text: She also revealed Homeland Security suggest her missing husband could be alive in Costa Rica

item.title: Matt Gaetz says he might hire Kyle Rittenhouse as an intern after murder trial
item.description:
Congressman Matt Gaetz (R-FL) said he believes Kyle Rittenhouse is â€œnot guiltyâ€ and he would consider bringing him on as an intern after his high-profile murder trial.

On Wednesday, Gaetz spoke to Newsmax host Grant Stinchfield and expressed that Rittenhouse â€œwould probably make a good congressional intern.â€

â€œWe may reach out to him and see if heâ€™d be interested in helping the country in additional ways,â€ Gaetz said.

Kyle Rittenhouse is not guilty and deserves a not guilty verdict. In fact, heâ€™d make a great Congressional Internâ€¦ https://t.co/QkvFSH5hgP
— Rep. Matt Gaetz (@Rep. Matt Gaetz) 1637199462

The jury in Rittenhouseâ€™s high-profile trial is ongoing, with another day of deliberations scheduled for Thursday.

The 18-year-old is accused of killing two people and injuring a third during a protest in Kenosha, Wisconsin, last summer over the police shooting of Jacob Blake.

Rittenhouse claimed his acts were in self-defense during the trial.

Sign up to our new free Indy100 weekly newsletter

â€œHe deserves a not guilty verdict, and I sure hope he gets it,â€ Gaetz said.

He also publicly denounced the punishment of rioter Jacob Chansley, 34, who stormed Capitol Hill in a fuzzy hat with horns on Jan. 6.

He received a 41-month prison sentence.

â€œThis QAnon Shaman is a relatively harmless, non-violent vegan, and the notion that he has to be in prison for three and a half years to settle some sort of political score defies justice,â€ Gaetz said.

He also said that the American people have a Department of Justice that is â€œthe most political agency in Washington.â€

Gaetz is under investigation for allegedly paying underage females for sex in violation of federal sex trafficking legislation in 2019.

Despite the allegations, he has denied any wrongdoing.
item.dc:creator: Breanna Robinson
item.author: Breanna Robinson

item.title: Duolingoâ€™s mascot becomes TikTok icon by twerking on tables and thirsting over Dua Lipa
item.description:
Language-learning app Duolingo has gained viral infamy on TikTok, all thanks to the antics of their green owl mascot called Duo.

In recent months, their TikTok account (@duolingo) has gained millions of views because of Duo having a finger (or should we say wing) on the pulse of popular trends on the platform. They also have a hilariously sassy and chaotic persona that viewers love to interact with.

@duolingo

This is an SOS #DuolingoEmployee #owltok #livelaughlove #helpme #imscared

After an array of viral videos, the big green bird has certainly cemented its status as an online personality and a meme.

Some of their most viewed videos include Duoâ€™s playful warning threats for people to keep up with their language lessons on their app while referencing pop culture moments like sharing their â€œemotionally wreckedâ€ wall slide to Taylor Swift recently re-released song All Too Well and â€œthirstingâ€ over pop star Dua Lipa.

Though this doesnâ€™t mean the platform has shied away from serious issues after they defended the use of LGBTQ material in their courses, hitting back at a negative commenter: â€œWeâ€™ll always say gay rights, sorry not sorry.â€

@duolingo

Reply to @agazeblank weâ€™ll always say gay rights, sorry not sorry ğŸŒˆ

So who exactly is responsible for Duolingo becoming a viral sensation?

Of course, it comes as no surprise that a Zoomer is behind the companyâ€™s internet relatability, as 23-year-old social media manager Zaria Parvez began making the owl mascot TikTokâ€™s for the company in September.

She told Insider that the companyâ€™s goal is to â€œhave fun and entertain,â€ and itâ€™s working.

â€œI think having that foundation of being a brand thatâ€™s mission-driven and is free really allows us, and gives us more space, to have fun in a way,â€ Parvez told Insider.

Sign up to our free Indy100 weekly newsletter

As Parvez only started making these popular TikTokâ€™s just a few months ago, she added that itâ€™s not yet clear if Duolingoâ€™s growing TikTok presence has directly caused an increase in people downloading and using their app.

â€œThe way that I think about it is that if I film this and it becomes viral, cool. We get users, awesome,â€ Parvez said. â€œBut we just want to have fun at the end of the day and entertain.â€

Here are some of Duolingoâ€™s most popular TikTok videos.

When you use Google Translate instead of Duolingo

@duolingo

every time you open Google Translate, I lose a feather. #duolingo #swiftok #enchanted #languagelearning #trend #brandtok #comedy

The main purpose of Duolingo is to help people learn a different language, and so you canâ€™t imagine their disappointment in finding out when someone has decided to use Google Translate instead.

Duo perfect captures the melancholy of this by dramatically looking out from behind a glass door and slowly collapsing to the floor in despair - itâ€™s dramatic in the best way.

Especially with Taylor Swiftâ€™s song Enchanted which has gained popularity on the app, plays in the background as she sings the lyrics: â€œPlease donâ€™t be in love with someone else, please donâ€™t have somebody waiting on you.â€

Since posting, the TikTok has received 11.6m views and 3.1m likes, with tens of thousands of comments such as: â€œso excited for enchanted (duoâ€™s versionâ€ with the owl showing off their pop culture knowledge in its reply, and hilariously wrote: â€œgoogle translate is my Jake Gyllenhaal.â€

Round of applause for saying â€œbonjourâ€

@duolingo

real ones let you do the bare minimum and give you full credit ğŸ˜Œ #Duolingo #ourgodisanawesomegod #trend #comedy #god #imscared #DuaLipa #DuaLingo

If this TikTok is anything to go by itâ€™s that small triumphs should be praised, as the on-screen caption reads: â€œWhen all you can say in French is â€˜bonjour.â€™â€

Que everybodyâ€™s favourite owl appearing at the top of the stairs and walking down while receiving a round of applause from colleagues as they cheer the owl on from the side of the stairs.

The video has gained nearly 10m views, with 1.8m likes and again thousands of comments from people hoping to get a reply from Duolingo.

â€œDuo actually captured all those people and forced them to do this!!â€ someone commented, to which Duo sassily replied: â€œYouâ€™re not lying.â€

Thirsting over Dua Lipa

@duolingo

hi mommy ğŸ˜Œ #comedy #DuaLipa #Duolingo #excuseme #mommysorry #Dualingo

It appears that Duo is quite the Dua Lipa fan after posting a video with a popular TikTok sound created by a TikTok user called @roofjesis where a man says: â€œExcuse me? Excuse me? Mommy? Sorry. Mommy? Sorry? Mommy? Sorry. Mommy? Sorry. Mommy?â€

As Duo stares off into the distance, various photos of the British pop star appear on the screen.

After Duo shared their fangirl moment, the video received 6.2m views, 1.3m and thousands of comments from people who didnâ€™t expect this crossover.

â€œLast thing I expected to see today is Duolingo calling Dua Lipa mommy,â€ one person said.

You and us both.

Reaction to Taylor Swiftâ€™s re-recording of All Too Well

(itâ€™s emotional)

@duolingo

wearing red lipstick to help me cope for the full 10 minutes #redtaylorsversion #swiftie #taylornation #taylorswift #alltoowell #Duolingo

With the release of Taylor Swiftâ€™s 10-minute version of All Too Well, TikTok has been flooded with reaction videos where fans get emotional listening to the extended track.

Duo appears to be one of these Swifties after using the song to demonstrate themselves practising their â€œemotionally wrecked wall slide.â€

Over 3.5m people have viewed the clip, along with gaining 690,000 likes and Swifties took to the comment section to share their thoughts.

â€œHow do you say â€˜whereâ€™s the scarf, Jakeâ€™ in Swiftie,â€ one fan asked, to which Duo replied: â€œTo do list: blow up Jakeâ€™s phone with push notifications.â€

Being self-aware of its chaotic energy on the platform

@duolingo

still donâ€™t see a problem with what i do - donâ€™t come for my beak!!! #Duolingo #comedy #avatarthelastairbander #trend #DuaLipa #elements #brandtok

There is nothing people on TikTok love more than a creator who is self-aware, and Duo definitely ticks this box in this particular video.

The mascot shared with viewers their decision making process as to â€œwhat assortment of unhinged I want to beâ€ and gave some pretty funny examples.

In keeping with the Avatar: The Last Airbender theme song listing off Earthâ€™s elementâ€™s, Duo listed off the different decisions to choose from.

â€œTwerking on conference room tables,â€ was the first one with two people spraying the air as the voiceover said â€œWaterâ€, followed by popping up from the bushing as the caption then read: â€œthirsting over Dua Lipa,â€ as the â€œEarth.â€

It then moved on to another that said â€œtrolling peopleâ€ which was obviously fire, with a lighter appearing in shot, and then finally air was â€œconstantly begging for attentionâ€ as Duo jumped over a small wooden ledge.

indy100 has contacted Duolingo for comment.

To view more of Duolingoâ€™s content, visit their TikTok page.
item.dc:creator: Sinead Butler
item.author: Sinead Butler
